originalText.text: This office actively harms the city and its citizens. Full incompetence and idiocy on display. These clowns have set progressive ideas and policies back decades and instigated a type of class warfare in the city as a result of their experiment where law biding citizens have legitimate reason to fear and not trust certain groups  of people - shame on anyone working in this office. You are nothing more than an opportunistic weasels with no interest in helping anyone and only care about your careers

originalText.text: 39-22.29 street lic ny 11101 was systematically stolen from me and it’s being held ghestapo style by city of nyc there is a supreme’s court decision giving me full rights to property today the city demolished the building and now is a garden I’m asking to return back the deed plus damages asap and end this chapter

originalText.text:
I went to prison for 10yrs and did 5yrs post for a crime I was never indicated for because a grand jury voted no bill !
They kidnapped me and used the broken rules of the judicial system to lie about it. After yrs of litigation and complaints an investigation was conducted regarding my original and superseding indictments (06379-07 & 1402-08).
The courts said they lacked jurisdiction to due anything to help me and I was outside the statute of limitation.I was robbed and set up by the police of the 77 percent because I refuse to write a statement on a co defendant who robbed a white woman in a lone act. My name is Maurice Newman and I was sentenced in Manhattan for a robbery in  Brooklyn that I had nothing to do with nor seen at but I was black and a white woman was robbed.

originalText.text: Ashlyn Rich has a lot to be desired for as a district attorney. To the criminal that took my stuff got a slap on the wrist and a program to better herself which is a total joke! What comes around goes around! Both of them will get what is deserved. Still have a good mind to sue both of them in small claims court. If I had no insurance on my phone, both of them would be paying. May everyday be a bad day for both of you and sleep in dirt. Trash that is what you both are.
